channel.title: Personal on Fuad Muhammad Nur
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Fuad Muhammad Nur

item.title: Finding My Writing Home with Hugo
item.description: A short story about how I discovered Hugo, why it fits my writing style, and how it helps me write freely without worrying about platforms, hosting, or complexity.

item.title: When Music Saves You From the City
item.description: Discover how I found Fleuro’s shoegaze gem “Kota Lelah” and why it perfectly mirrors the exhausting vibe of Jakarta. A personal story about music, city life, and the bands that keep me sane.
